SEARCH
Package com.example.controller

Class InventoryController

java.lang.Object
com.example.controller.InventoryController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/inventory") public class InventoryController extends Object
Controller for managing inventory items. This controller provides various endpoints to interact with the inventory data.

  • Method Details

    • getAllInventoryItems

      @GetMapping public List<Inventory> getAllInventoryItems()
      Retrieves all inventory items.
      Returns:
      A list of all inventory items.

    • getInventoryItemById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Inventory> getInventoryItemById(@PathVariable String id)
      Retrieves a single inventory item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the inventory item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The requested inventory item, or a 404 Not Found response if not found.

    • addNewInventoryItem

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Inventory> addNewInventoryItem(@RequestBody Inventory inventory)
      Adds a new inventory item.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The inventory item to add.
      Returns:
      The added inventory item.

    • updateInventoryItem

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Inventory> updateInventoryItem(@PathVariable String id, @RequestBody Inventory updatedInventory)
      Updates an existing inventory item.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the inventory item to update.
      updatedInventory - The updated inventory item data.
      Returns:
      The updated inventory item, or a 404 Not Found response if not found.

    • decrementInventoryItem

      @PutMapping("/decrement/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Inventory> decrementInventoryItem(@PathVariable String id)
      Decrements the quantity of an inventory item by 1. If the inventory item's quantity is already 0 or less, responds with a Bad Request.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the inventory item to decrement.
      Returns:
      The updated inventory item, or a 404 Not Found response if not found.

    • deleteInventoryItemById

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteInventoryItemById(@PathVariable String id)
      Deletes an inventory item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the inventory item to delete.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the result of the deletion operation.

    • getRestockList

      @GetMapping("/restock") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Inventory>> getRestockList()
      Retrieves a list of inventory items that need to be restocked (quantity greater than 5000).
      Returns:
      A list of inventory items that need restocking.
